metadata.title: CVE-2020-14947 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: OCS Inventory NG 2.7 allows Remote Command Execution via shellmetacharacters to require/commandLine/CommandLine.php because mib_file inplugins/main_sections/ms_config/ms_snmp_config.php is mishandled inget_mib_oid.

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
